alert.note: Alert for Grady (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 9:03PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Grady County through 930 PM EST... At 902 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Whigham, or 9 miles southwest of Cairo, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cairo, Calvary, Reno, Grady Co A/p, Princes Still, Moncrief, Pine Park, Nickleville and Beachton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EST for south central and southwestern Georgia.
